website_summaries.verdict: A great choice where space is limited, though performance may vary based on positioning of bass tube.
pros: Can be added to an existing system without modification
cons: Does not deliver the heavy, thumping power some consumers seek

customer_reviews.title: Bazooka delivers
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Put it in my jeep wrangler. Takes up a little more space than I wanted, but it sounds really good. My daughter drives the jeep most the time and she loves the sound. I've been using bazooka subs for 28 years. you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: onedirectioninfection

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Subwoofer! After reading all the good reviews, I went ahead and purchased 2 of these. I am very glad I did. These subs pack quite a punch. My car and truck sound terrific now. I was able to put this under my back seat in my 1998 Extended Cab Z71 and in the trunk of my 2008 Civic. Having the amp built in saved a lot of work and space as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something small and not too big to rattle my trunk. One of the best perks is that I can easlily unplug and remove the unit whenever I need trunk space. Sound quality is good for the price, Im still playing with the radio equalizer to find better balance but so far I'm satisfied with the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Laan

customer_reviews.title: Not shabby.
customer_reviews.text: Hard wired onto my ACC line. Some of the lows do not hit as well as I had hope. However for $200.00, it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Herman

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good added to my Factory Honda Fit system. While it is an easy theory of how it wires up. I had taken many parts off the car to run the wiring in a clean way. Follow the instructions and the recommendations for wiring to use. It is in my hatchback but it is easy to move in order to haul something. I use an old bag strap to hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Finley

customer_reviews.title: Booming Bass Sound
customer_reviews.text: Size doesn't matter with the Bazooka. Compact, 100 watt unit BOOMS, it will make your rearview mirror vibrate/shake if you want it to. The tube plastic housing seems very durable and also gives off bass sound. Built in amp is a plus, installation is straight forward and simple. The rear sound/volume level control is a snap to adjust to taste, the all in-one quick disconnect cable makes it super easy to unplug and move the tube if you need the cargo space. I shopped around, nobody beats the AMAZON price.
customer_reviews.author: The Fix It Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great bass great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for the price. As someone that listens to a lot of rock music, I dont need something that will rattle my car window, but something that's punchy enough to hear the lows of the drums and bass, and this does it!
customer_reviews.author: John Wayne Weaver III

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super glad I bought this unit. It sounds great and works perfect! It made a huge difference in the total sound quality. Don't let the 6" size fool you, it thumps hard and I'm only running the Amp gain at 30-40%. I bought this for a 2014 Toyota Tacoma 4-Door pick up. I'm running the factory head unit and all factory speakers. Pretty easy to install in a couple of hours. Just run power from the battery to the sub, ground it and then splice into the two back door speakers. The only hard part was getting to the factory speaker wires in the pillar between the front and back door. No regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Hunter

customer_reviews.title: it still sounds as good as new
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bazooka installed in my 2004 Silverado for almost four years now, it still sounds as good as new. The tube fits out of sight under the extended cab back seat, the sound it produces is incredible for a 6" tube. I had two Infinity Basslinks prior to purchasing this, both failed after two years.Figured I'd wait a few years on the Bazooka before giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shovelsj

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Killer sound in my 2015 promaster city. Sounds amazing. Great product. Installed where the faux window is. Bass is BOOMIN now. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound is great and still working after years of use
customer_reviews.author: b_1987

customer_reviews.title: The BOMB !
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bazooka!! Sound quality is great in my Grand Am GT, couldn't imagine having installed a 12" w/ a box and amp when this is all you need for incredibly crisp, full sound in your vehicle. Mine is installed in the trunk of a coupe and is only turned up half way. Install only took about an hour. If you have $170 to buy this guy and the cords, DO IT! You will not regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: est586

customer_reviews.title: Sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit behind rear seat behind driver. Sound good. a little tighter than the factory unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Hanvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love rap music and this is still the perfect amount of bass in my Honda Civic. I used to have twelves in the trunk and I honestly hated it. I want quality sound, I don't need to show off how much my car can vibrate. Awesome. Best part is I don't need an amp, its all in one. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first.....but LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this entirely of the previous reviews, Wanting to add FULLNESS to my truck audio system, I was skeptical about this small sub. I installed it in a 2010 F250 behind the rear seat with no modification needed to my truck at all to fit it in, didn't even have to remove the seat, slide in with little to no effort, even with my rear powered window. Hooked it up and was shocked. Sounds great and for me hits hard enough. Not going to wake up the neighbors, but just good full sounding system, tied it all together with an Alpine power pack for the other four speakers, as to retain my factory deck with Sync. Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Bazooka products
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a powered subwoofer that was designed to to fit under your car seat but it did not work out of the box. So I bought a bazooka instead. I've had bazooka's in the past but I wanted something that would not take up too much space because I installed it on a 2005 Chevy Silverado std cab. It works great and does not take up too much space. It is behind the passenger seat and can be easily removed to gain access to the jack and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great !!
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the review on this product before purchasing. Sound promising so I purchased it. I took it to the local stereo shop and installed it. Sounds great !! lots of BASS for small size. Unbelievable !! My friends could not believe this small bazooka can produce some pounding bass..
customer_reviews.author: nhk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2002 S-10 single cab pickup with no room, but this product Worked great, filled in the rear of the cab with just what I was missing! I thought it was a-little pricey but when I got it I found it to have quality construction! Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: mikezod

customer_reviews.title: Work great in a Crewmax
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great it fits behind the rear seat of a 2013 Tundra CrewMax without the straps to hold it in. The bass is strong and tight. The tube will not pound outside the truck. The bass is loud inside the rearview mirror rattles with the volume up. It is more than enough power. If you want to pound the bass get two 12" and 500 a channel. But if you want great sounding music go with this.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, not too boomy like larger size ones. Fits perfect in my Ranger regular cab.
customer_reviews.author: DaBinChe

customer_reviews.title: Add the real sound to your auto
customer_reviews.text: Most systems in the car are missing the best part...a real full sound..Add the real sound to your auto. Get this and it will do that. Love Bazooka tubes and have for years now. This size is perfect for a truck and small car.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazon would not return as of yet.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work defective. Will not produce any sound.
customer_reviews.author: Keverett

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: How do i use it no wiring cant hook up use less
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas r wnek

customer_reviews.title: Superior Sound!
customer_reviews.text: This added the extra sound I was looking for. The sound is superior!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis C. Brown II

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I had heard the one in my daughter's jeep and it sounded awesome without taking up too much space so I ordered one for mine. I am very impressed with the sound that comes out of this 6-inch bazooka. The only thing I wish it would come with is better installation instructions and descriptions. The instructions were somewhat confusing but I eventually figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Joel McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Bazookas Rock
customer_reviews.text: added this to my 2010 F150. This is just what I needed to complete the sound in my truck. It fills the cab with sound and doesn't rattle everyone that is beside me in traffic. I just ordered the remote gain control for it as the sound varies from one type of music to another. Other than that I'm extremely happy with the sound and performance of this system. I would highly recommend it to anyone that wants to have full but discreet sound.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Musgrave II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my 05 mini cooper not earth shattering but very impressive for the size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sub to add some base to the factory speakers in my Ford F-150. I cannot say enough about how happy I am with this sub. The bass is clear, the box doesnt rattle, its well made. It was easy to install. I connected it to a Pioneer head unit with bass controls built in so it was almost plug and play. It has a small footprint and have it mounted under the back seat in the truck. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BNFinNC

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed. installed 2010 ford F350 crew cab.
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed in My 2010 F350 Crew Cab. I am really impressed what this little 6" 100 watt sub can do. It will not move the mirrors like a 10" or 12" boxed sub. but it fit right behind the rear seats with a little wiggling. also note that I had an KTP-445U - Alpine 4-Channel 45W RMS X 4 installed behind the stock head unit also after I replaced the 4 factory speakers. this truck sounds real nice now and I have kept the stock controls intact. My XM, and Sync all work just fine. this is a killer set up for less then $600 installed. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trackstand

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bass tube to be used in my pick-up. It fit nicely behind my seat. Installation was easy. The sound is great. Not a pounding bass but, just enough to add bottom to the sound. I would reccomend this to any one who is looking to upgrade their exsisting system.
customer_reviews.author: jet mech

customer_reviews.title: It gave my sound system bass and a better quality of sound
customer_reviews.text: I placed the bazooka in the trunk of my Honda Goldwing. It gave my sound system bass and a better quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: steven d murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, really added some dept to my music
customer_reviews.author: Ken Karaczewski

customer_reviews.title: WOW! This Thing Really Rocks my Van
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this small tube would not do enough to boost the low end bass in my 2011 Chevy full size conversion van with factory radio. Wow was I wrong. Installed it in the rear of the van pointed about 4 inches from the back door on the drivers side and all I can saw is wow, wow, wow. The sub's level control is barely turned up and the sound is more than adequate. Buy this thing now - you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: BobChicagoland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and fairly easy upgrade to my system. Worth every penny..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound, loud enough for me, pounds for a 6". Small enough to put in a tight spot. I am definitely pleased. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great sounds
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my Ford Ranger. I put it in the back of the extended cab and it sounded great for the small area. I sold the truck to my brother-in-law who's in high school and when I hear him coming I can hear the tube pounding just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kupa 'Aina

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed in a standard cab Ford Ranger w/ a Clarion CZ500 head unit. For a 6" 100W subwoofer, I'm pretty satisfied with it. It's not a miracle tube, but I'd compare the volume and performance to that of a single 10" subwoofer in a car. I'd be hesitant to install it in a car or SUV as it would have considerably more air space to 'fill.'
customer_reviews.author: The Chad

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy for car that my 17 year son will ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for car that my 17 year son will be driving. great sound but not too loud to wake up the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bass tube. Easy to install. Sounds great. Perfect for my Wrangler Unlimited. Not too loud, just right for someone who wants a little more bass without making yourself look dumb at traffic lights.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Bazooka BTA6100 BT Series 6-Inch 100-Watt Amplified Tube Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: 94' Chevy x-tra cab. With only the 4x6 plate speakers, (upgraded with amp) still needed to fill the lows. Awsome! Easy hook-up though wires seem smaller than gauge? 6" w/100amp really rounds out the sound, as loud as you'll want.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted for my S10 pickup regular cab. It fits well behind the seat and has more than enough power.
customer_reviews.author: Newhome1

customer_reviews.title: Powered Bazooka performance
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, clean with good performance. I like all the bass frequencies at the level they were recorded, not ear shattering boom,boom at some and nothing at others. On some songs there are several different bass notes and this unit faithfully reproduces them. The level is very adequate for my Accord. The small size allows me to mount the Sub just in front of the driver's seat which gives good spacial (bass in front) sense. When someone shorter has to drive the car, I simply undo the straps move the Sub.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Mcneill

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these subs and was amazed at the bass they provided in both my and my daughters cars. They were easy to install and sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Woodhead

customer_reviews.title: PHENOMINAL!
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond great. The clarity and power inside this sub in incomprehensible. Hits hard, any has power for the long bass notes. HIGHLY recommend! so seasy to install and has power to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Izic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Big things really do come in small packages. Perfect for fitting underneath a back seat in my Supercab F-150. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another !
customer_reviews.author: Roughin' It

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: I installed this amplified bass tube in my 2009 Ford F-150 supercrew expecting to get a little more bass. I was totally suprised at the amount of bass and quality it produced. It fits perfectly under my rear seats and produces plenty of bass in the cabin without making everyone else outside my vehicle hear my music. It was easy to install and does a great job keeping up with quick bass notes that larger speaker have a hard time keeping up with. I also purchased the optional bazooka remote bass controller switch which is a must for adjusting the amount of bass for different types of music all from the drivers seat.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERS WITH A PUNCH
customer_reviews.text: I'VE HAD SYSTEMS FOR OVER 10 YEARS NOW. FOR THIS SIZE OF THIS TUBE AND THE PRICE YOU CAN'T DO ANY BETTER. I DRIVE A 4 DOOR TACOMA AND THE ONLY BOX THAT WOULD FIT WAS A JBL ENCLOSED SPECIAL FIT BOX WITH 2 SUBS. OH YEAH, IT ONLY COST $699 FROM CRUTCHFIELD! IT DOES NOT HAVE THE DEEP THUMP LIKE 12'S OR 15'S DO. BUT IF YOUR LOOKING FOR GOOD SOLID BASS THAT DOES NOT TAKE UP ANY ROOM BUY THIS, IT'S WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.author: ROLL TIDE 14

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sub
customer_reviews.text: Great little sub for my single cab truck. Sounded better than I hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Craig from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: got it for ma yaris hatchback Great sound and minimum space!!!!! its great for that extra sound that was missing with only the factory speakers !! Super fast installation!! the space of the truck thats smallllllllllll already stayed practically the same lost only 15% of it at the most
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Guillermo Serrano Pieretti

customer_reviews.title: I definitely would recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 Honda CRV and its speakers are alright. When I put this new sub in redefined the value of this cars sound system. I definitely would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rieger

customer_reviews.title: A breeze to hook up.
customer_reviews.text: Great little add on. Very easy to install in my 05 prius. Not too loud but made it sound full.
customer_reviews.author: bo speer

customer_reviews.title: Great for filling the gaps in car audio.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the kind of guy who wants the "loudest" stereo, I just want it to sound good. I've had smaller powered subs in my last few cars, and I'm very happy with this bazooka. It doesn't take up much room, but does fill in the bass where needed, making the car audio much more enjoyable. I'm happy with it, and will consider one for my next car.
customer_reviews.author: Durwood Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great value and design
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have used Bazooka bass tubes in vehicles since the 90's. I've always been impressed with the bass they put out. This past application was not suitable for me in a large cargo trailer surrounded by 4 plywood surfaces. I think these need some sort of acoustic surrounding material such as carpet to make a more acoustic environment. My environment lacked that. Cargo trailer also have a large amount of airspace to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Matt from SD

customer_reviews.title: Little space, big bass
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Bazooka tube (my first finally died after 4 years) and probably won't be my last. What I love the most is the compact footprint. I get the low end I like without sacrificing my trunk. It won't out-perform those mega boxes, but who REALLY needs that?
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Smooth sound. Big bass
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my 2004 Toyota Tacoma single cab truck. Fits in back perfect behind the seat and sounds like a CHAMP. I love it. Lots of power but no gritty vibrations. Flawless!
customer_reviews.author: RebekahZ808

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound. Not quite as deep of a sound as I hoped for but not too bad. I wasn’t wanting anything that would rattle windows or anything. Just wanting a little more deep sound. One concern is that I was surprised that the instructions preferred to hook up with speaker wires as opposed to using the rca jacks. My speaker wires were all dedicated to the existing speakers so I used the RCA outputs from stereo. Maybe that’s why it’s lacking in the depth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobo L Tafolla Jr

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!  Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Added missing bass on my Bennington Boat. Its perfect to round out the sound and add some oomph! was super easy to install and setup.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!!!
customer_reviews.text: Put this little baby in the back of my '05 MINI Cooper when I upgraded the factory head unit to an Alpine. Perfect! I just wanted more bottom end punch and this did the trick. Don't expect to blow out your windows, but expect crisp bass in a package made for tight spaces. Bonus--I can remove it in about 20 seconds when I need the space. Solid bass without breaking the bank and everything is included!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This thing hits incredibly hard for a small 6 inch subwoofer. Very impressive! It will hit as hard or more so than a 10" of equal wattage and costs less! However, due to its ability to hit as hard as it does, it seems to lack clarity. The 10" subwoofer that I previously mentioned can hit just as hard, but doesn't need to do as much work to do it, therefor, the sound quality seems to be much better. Even so, if you're looking to spend no more than the price of this little subwoofer, then I think it is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, powerful sub, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy installation, plenty of power, packs a punch!
customer_reviews.author: chriswhite_x

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for those tight places
customer_reviews.text: Love these tube speakers. Eight year old ones that I installed behind the back seats of my pickup crapped out. Stereo finally sounds like it suppose to. Since I already had the cables installed this was just a matter of unstrapping the tie downs and plugging in the cable to the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: sftodd

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after reading all the positive reviews and glad I did. All the good things said about this sub are true. Hard to believe it sounds as good as it does for only a 6 inch sub. I have had sub enclosures before with 2 tens and this sounds as good if not better. This sub will not rattle the hinges on your trunk loose but it does provide a solid, tight, clean sounding bass. One attribute that I have not seen others comment on is how well built this is. Its very durable. You could stand on this thing and not damage it! Well done Bazooka.
customer_reviews.author: Journey277

customer_reviews.title: Added to my updated stereo in my 2005 Frontier Crew ...
customer_reviews.text: Added to my updated stereo in my 2005 Frontier Crew cab truck. Mounted it on the floor over the drive shaft hump in back seat. I can still haul 4 people with no leg room issues. Added the punch I couldn't get from the door speakers. Not for people who want the ground shaking bass.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis3985

customer_reviews.title: 6" is not enough base
customer_reviews.text: It just sounds ok 8" or 10" is better, 6" is not enough
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted good sound NOT window shakin' but full bass sound for YOUR ears!!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, installed by Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have it installed by Best Buy for $110 in my mini-van between the two front seats, and it made a whole lot of difference in all the music played from the CD player. I can even adjust the bass level on the back of the unit from my driver seat. It is definitely worth the investment if you like good bass and enhancement to any music you listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Hon-peng Phillip Lau

customer_reviews.title: Kicks alot of BASS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this thing so far! After grounding it correctly (to a bolt in your car! not to a wall using tape!) it pumped out some beautiful BOOMAGE. Great for how small it is and really has filled out the sound in my single cap full size 1991 chevy. All is well and you should buy it!
customer_reviews.author: SteeblerTech

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Sub for my small truck but have no space. There are two jumpseats in the back that I can take people in but it is really tight! This sub works out great! It has great bass, & doesn't ake up much space. Plus, I live in NYC. in a high crime area, % I can un=plug and take it out of the truck Good Product & Bazooka was also very helpful with advice.
customer_reviews.author: bikerX

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and price!
customer_reviews.text: For being a small all in one unit, it works very well. It is well designed and the attachments made the install very easy! Longest time was hiding the wires. Has nice bass and can be adjusted. Price was very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Infn4me

customer_reviews.title: ... mine hooked up today in my lancer and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine hooked up today in my lancer and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to complete the system in my husbands truck. He was so excited to install and hear what his stereo system sounded like. it was a perfect fit in his 2000 chevrolet silverado.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: For such a compact AMP/Subwoofer combo, this one is pretty good. You don't get the GHETTO bass sound but it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: intellectually_stupid

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great full, rich, sound with plenty of bass. I bought this for my 2015 Jeep JK and it fits perfectly behind the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: The Yarber's

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: For a 6 inch speaker this thing is awesome! I have it in the trunk of my 07 Accord Sedan. It gives that extra bass you are looking for! It was very easy to hook up and I am very very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy install. Can't beat a bazooka. There's a reason they've been around so long. Perfect addition to my Honda Ridgeline aftermaket system.
customer_reviews.author: rightmuch

customer_reviews.title: Mega bass
customer_reviews.text: This fits behind my back seat of my 2015 Ford F1 50 sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you know what you are doing, then you know how great these tubes are. Nothing better than clean bass
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Boom
customer_reviews.text: Added the 100w 6" to the trunk of my Avalon with the stock sound system. This sub was easy to install using the FAST wires and the sound now is Much better. This sub is a great addition to the factory sound system. Definitly a good purchase. like others said its not overwhelming bass, but is clean and tight bass.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is amazing. How could such a small speaker sound so good. Must be the design. Great sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Accelerate

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Added this under the rear seat of my 06 ext cab duramax to go with a Kenwood H/U and alpine speakers in the doors. Night and day difference in sound. Added just the right amount of base for the music I listen to. I also used the sub outputs on the HU so I can control the tube output with the HU. Worked out great.....highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 0rion

customer_reviews.title: Great for factory replacement
customer_reviews.text: This went into the factory subwoofer section of a Range Rover and has double the power and clarity of what it replaced. Highly recommend this subwoofer as a factory replacement due to its cost, size, and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: George Z. Marootian

customer_reviews.title: Low key bass
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer was a perfect addition to my system. I use a Pioneer deck and Boston Acoustics speakers. Unfortunately I am forced to use 5"x7" speakers, but with this sub it creates a nice balance. It provides just enough low end sound without rattling the paint off your car.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Rockholz

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice stereo sound better.
customer_reviews.text: I just installed one of these in my daughter's New Beetle and while the bass could be adjusted to booming levels right out of the box there was a marked improvement in the sound of the factory stereo. It has a very full, rich sound now. My only reason for not giving it five stars is that it did not come with anything to mount it in the car so I had to fabricate my own mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by the amount of sound that comes out of such a little speaker. Installation was a breeze. I got a 1000w amp wiring kit and between that and everything that came with the tube it just slid into place. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elden C. Coning III

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small car or truck
customer_reviews.text: I have it behind the seat in a single cab truck and it is plenty loud enough. Its good for a small car or any truck in my opinion. happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: YakFisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for the price and sound quality you cant beat the value
customer_reviews.author: afraz hosein

customer_reviews.title: It does not take up much space but makes a nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and fits nicely in my son's vehicle. I am considering one for myself. It does not take up much space but makes a nice sound. I am no expert but seems like a good value for the sound it produces
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Surprising thump!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased used from Amazon. This thing works fantastic. Not going to win any contests but it adds a very nice bottom cheaply. Have mine in a Ford Edge and it more than fills it with nice smooth thump.
customer_reviews.author: Dude man

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer package
customer_reviews.text: This little subwoofer sounds great and is awesome for my single cab toyota. Definitely wait until it breaks in before cranking it up, but great subwoofer. Had it for around a month and it does great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Poulin

customer_reviews.title: great bass super easy install
customer_reviews.text: my 05 prius stock radio went from BAD to BADASS in 20 minutes ... this bass module ROCKS! get it now
customer_reviews.author: Rey D. Maldonado

product_meta.title: Bazooka BTA6100 BT Series 6-Inch 100-Watt Amplified Tube Subwoofer
product_meta.description:
Bazooka BTA6100 BT Series Amplified Subwoofer (6" 100W)

AMAZON.COM
As all-in-one solutions go, you simply can't beat the A100 Amplified Bass Tubes by Bazooka. Designed to be a simple-to-install yet effective upgrade to your car's existing mobile audio system, the A100 Bass Tubes feature a 100-watt, 2-channel amplifier built right in, coupled to a dual voice coil woofer. Since the amplifier has a built-in crossover to remove the high frequencies that the woofer cannot play from the signal, you get exactly what you need in the A100--crisp, clean bass and nothing more. When connected to your system, the end result is seamless integration, both electrically and audibly, yielding sound quality that your factory system simply can't touch. 

Crisp, clean bass and nothing more. Click to enlarge. 

The Bazooka Bass Tubes enclosure is optimized for corner loading. Click to enlarge. 

The corner of your car amplifies the concentrated bass output of the Bass Tubes enclosure. Click to enlarge. 

BT Amplified Bass Tubes
The new amplified Bazooka subwoofers feature the legendary patented Bass Tubes enclosure design, but with a twist. These units are completely self-contained bass monsters. Available in 100-watt BTL or 250-watt Class D amplifier configurations, the new amplified Bazooka subwoofers are the true solution to the common automobile interior problem of "not enough space for bass." 

A Bazooka subwoofer adds the bass, clarity, and realism that your system is missing with absolutely no modifications to your car, its warranty, or its original audio system. If you are leasing your car, there is no better way to upgrade your stereo system than by adding a Bazooka subwoofer. 

BTA6100
The BTA6100 features a 6-inch dual voice coil subwoofer and fits in places most subs can't. The 6-inch works great behind the seat of small trucks, the trunks of sedans, or hatchbacks. Simply point it into the rear corner to take advantage of the Bass Tubes enclosure, and you're rockin' in no time! 

The Bazooka subwoofer's patented Bass Tubes bass-reflex enclosure design allows for use of 100% of the woofer's cone area. Inch for inch, it will outperform most boxes. 

The Bazooka Bass Tubes enclosure is optimized for corner loading, and its port and woofer are on the same plane and in close proximity for maximum corner-loading results. And, just like a megaphone amplifies a cheerleader's voice, the corner of your car amplifies the concentrated bass output of the Bass Tubes enclosure. 

Its advantage is that it fits any vehicle: the perfect fit for a perfect sound. 

As with all Bass Tubes Enclosures, the BTA6100 comes with straps to keep the sub securely mounted, while still making removal quick and easy if you need even more cargo room. 

Bazooka Add-ons
Use Bazooka's F.A.S.T. harnesses to make installation even easier. They're a simple way to protect your vehicle's warranty by making installation a plug-in process. The T-shaped harness has three ends: One plugs into your car's OE radio, one plugs into the plug you removed from the OE radio, and the third end runs all the way back to the rear of the car and plugs into your A100 Bazooka subwoofer. Great for leased vehicles, the F.A.S.T. systems are available for most popular cars. 

Bazooka's RBCM-100 Remote Bass Control Module allows you to control the amount of bass from the driver's seat. 

Optional Chrome-Plated UMS Brackets give a flashier look, as well as a more secure, permanent mounting when removal isn't a problem. 

What's in the Box
Bazooka BTA6100 BT Series 6-Inch 100-Watt Amplified Tube Subwoofer, wiring harness, installation hardware, and instruction manual.

Line- And Speaker-Level Inputs frequency Response 39-85 Hz subsonic Filter (12 Db/Octave At 35 Hz) For Improved Amp Efficiency
